metadata.title: Baan Sayiuan | Our home in Rawai
metadata.description: Your complete guide to our home in Rawai, Phuket. Everything you need for an amazing stay.

welcome.label: Welcome Home
welcome.title: Mi casa es tu casa
welcome.story1: This isn't just our house—it's where we escape, recharge, and make memories. We want you to feel the same magic we do when we're here.
welcome.story2: From secret beaches to our favorite sunset spots, we've poured everything we love about Rawai into this guide. Make yourself at home, explore like a local, and most importantly: relax.

experiences.label: Your Rawai
experiences.title: Three ways to fall in love with this place

beach.title: Beach & Ocean
beach.description: Crystal-clear waters, hidden coves, and the best sunset spots we've found after countless evenings watching the sky turn pink.

islands.title: Island Hopping
islands.description: Longtail boats to paradise islands. Snorkeling, deserted beaches, and local seafood on the sand—exactly as Thailand should be.

culture.title: Living Local
culture.description: Night markets, temple visits, and the little moments that make you fall in love with Thai culture. We'll show you our favorites.

privateMode.title: Private Access
privateMode.description: Enter the passcode shared with you to access door code and WiFi password.
privateMode.hint: Contact us if you need the passcode.

locked.doorCode: Door code will be shared before arrival.

taxi.title: Airport taxi
taxi.description: We can arrange a taxi for 700 THB (cash). The driver will wait for you at arrivals with your name on a sign. Just send us your flight details.

atm.title: Important: ATMs in Thailand
atm.description: ATMs here give you the cash BEFORE returning your card. So many people forget their card and leave. Don't be that person. Also, always choose 'Without conversion' to avoid terrible exchange rates.

esim.title: Get an eSIM before you fly
esim.description: Install it before takeoff so you have internet the second you land.

immigration.title: Immigration queue
immigration.description: Can be 30 min or 2 hours depending on when you arrive.

fastTrack.title: Priority Lane
fastTrack.description: Meet-and-greet service through priority lane. Around 1000–2000 THB per person. Worth it if arriving late or with kids.

boats.title: Boat trips
boats.help: We know good captains. Just ask.

dayPasses.title: Hotel day passes
dayPasses.description: Day passes give you access to hotel pools and facilities for the day, sometimes with food and drink credit.

atHome.title: At home
atHome.ac: Turn off AC when leaving. Close doors when AC is on.

guestForm.title: Help us prepare
guestForm.description: Tell us what you like so we can stock up.
guestForm.confirmation: We received everything. See you soon.

thai.title: Essential Thai for Farang
thai.description: Master these phrases and you'll charm every local. Trust us, a little Thai goes a long way!
